summary: When singer Guy Lambert goes on tour in Europe, he is pursued by two beautiful women, bumbling jewel thieves, and a mysterious killer.
cast: Elvis Presley|Annette Day|John Williams|Yvonne Romain|The Wiere Brothers|Chips Rafferty|Norman Rossington|Monte Landis|Michael Murphy|Leon Askin|John Alderson|Stanley Adams|Maurice Marsac|Walter Burke|Helene Winston|Don Ames|Bob Bergy|Hal Bokar|Fred Carson|Craig Chudy|Barry Cole|George Dee|George DeNormand|Ted DeWayne|Brent Dunsford|Harold 'Hal' Frizzell|Luke Gerard|Josh Harding|Chester Hayes|Robert Hitchcock|Rodney Hoeltzel|Bob Homel|Kim Howe|Mary Hughes|Robert Isenberg|Kathryn Janssen|Michael Jeffers|Bob Johnson|Murray Kamelhar|Marilyn Keymer|Melody Keymer|George Klein|Laurie Lambert|Monique LeMaire|Frank Mitchell|Jan Reddin|Danny Rees|Leoda Richards|Christopher Riordan|Ted Roter|Jerry Rush|Audrey Saunders|Ray Saunders|Alex Sharp|George Simmons|Ralph Smiley|Billy Smith|Billy Snyder|Jack Teagarden|Rick Teagarden|Sheryl Ullman|Harry Wiere|Herbert Wiere|Sylvester Wiere|John Zimeas
title: Doble problema
